name: sprocket
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a device like a wheel with one or more rows of tooth-like parts sticking out that keeps a chain moving on a bicycle or pulls film, paper, etc. through a machine
Dave King/Dorling Kindersley/GettyImages
